snippet: The manager of a Miami restaurant where 15 people, including many youngsters, were shot at a teenage party early Sunday was arrested on a charge of selling liquor without a license.
abstract: Tiffany Johnson, manager of Miami restaurant The Spot, where 15 people, including many youngsters, were shot at a teenage party, is arrested on a charge of selling liquor without a license.
lead_paragraph: The manager of a Miami restaurant where 15 people, including many youngsters, were shot at a teenage party early Sunday was arrested on a charge of selling liquor without a license.

headline.main: Florida: Liquor Violation Found After Club Shooting
headline.print_headline: Florida: Liquor Violation Found After Club Shooting
